name: BITzkrieg
description:
Install instructions

Simply execute the installer and follow the instructions.

Default controls:

-ESC in the main menu to quit the game;

-HOME on a level to go back to the main menu;

-F2 when pressed in 1 player mode will change the game to 2 player mode.

Player1:

-WASD to move;

-H to shoot;

-J to plant mine.

Player 2:

-Arrow keys to move;

-Numpad 1 to shoot;

-Numpad 2 to plant mine.

The controls can be changed in the configurations menu. To do so simply hold the key you want to bind and click the button labeled with the action you want to bind the key to.
